basics.label: GitHub Student Developer | Spark AR Facilitator | Mozilla | GirlScript Vizag | Former Intern at SanRon |
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.Tech. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the Sagi Rama Krishnam Raju Engineering College. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2020.

work.summary: Design of a framework for acquisition and analysis of distributed infrasound signals

Identify power quality issues and inform users and the public
Design an interface for distributed power quality metrics consumption and reporting
